turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Suzy! Can you please get me coffe from the Starbucks at 1709 W Pflugerville Pkwy in Pflugerville?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am trying to decide if I want a hot coffee or a cold one. What would you get?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I would get a cold one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. I will get an iced pumpkin spiced latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please get me a venti size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want regular milk or something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like regular coffe or decaf?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me regular coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like a single shot or a double shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a double shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Would you like whipped cream on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'll take whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Please ask them to go easy on the ice. I don't like too much ice in my drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Go it. Let me read the order to you to make sure I have it correctly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want a venti size iced pumpkin spiced latte made with almond milk, a double shot of espresso (regular not decaf), whipped cream, and a little bit of ice. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I am on my way to Starbucks at 1709 W Pflugerville Pkwy in Pflugerville. I will be back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
